title: East Woodlawn Loft
posting_body: ['East Woodlawn penthouse residence in stately Greystone.', 'Enjoy this 3 br/2ba + office and rear deck with bright south and east exposures.', 'At 1800 sq ft, this unit offers spacious living and an open floor plan with hardwood floors and high ceilings.', 'The living room has a wood burning fireplace and adjoins a large kitchen with a dining area.', 'The 3 large bedrooms include a primary suite with its own private bathroom, featuring a separate whirlpool soaking tub and shower.', 'The laundry room has a tub sink and washer/dryer.', 'Gas forced heat, central air conditioning and a new hot water system ensure a comfortable living climate.', 'Walking distance to University of Chicago and the upcoming Obama Presidential Library, convenient to Lakeshore Drive, the expressway, shopping and more!', 'Cat or dog allowed with additional $200 deposit and $50/month as pet rent.']
